experience: You and Darakshan both know Cliff Schertz, Dustin Faultner, SPHR (L.I.O.N.), and 19 others
I hired an UNEMPLOYED with a very long EMPLOYMENT gap, 12 years.
She was a stay-home mom whose 4 children grew up.
Of 1250 people that I hired this was the longest gap. The next one down was someone with a 5 year gap. He took time off to take care of his ailing parents and their family business.
In both cases, nobody else wanted to hire them other than for minimum wage jobs.
The lady heads up a major HR function now.
A parenthood is a perfect experience for an HR person.
The gentleman is a software developer with a big name Internet company. He kept his skills current during the break.
The only thing that matters is the ability to do the job.
We should put aside all prejudice, all dogmas, all nonsense "common sense".
And simply hire best people for the job.

Sending a warm welcome to Sathish Muthukrishnan, who has been named Chief Digital and Information Officer for Aerospace. He joins us from American Express in Phoenix where he was the Chief Information Officer and Vice President, Enterprise Digital, Enterprise API Engineering and Big Data Labs.

Recurring Decimal is an organically funded; privately held company that specializes in niche technology skills for specific business needs. We bring several years of software development, solution architecture, product management and IT/IS management expertise across industry verticals and Fortune 50 companies. Our focus is to provide the best possible service to our clients, candidates and most importantly to our team.
Privately held. 5 offices across India. 150 - 200 employees. http://www.focusonIT.com

summary: Experienced Resource/ Account manager/ Analyst having over 10 yrs of experience in IT recruitment. Excellent blend of experience in the areas of Resource Management/ Full life cycle Recruitment, Account Management, Business Analysis and Business Development. Partnering with clients to provide technical staffing solutions which consist of, end to end project delivery and turnkey solutions; to contractors for staff supplementation; contract, contract to hire and direct hire positions . Handled various Corporate and National Accounts. Conducted College Campus recruitment's. Expertise in complete recruitment cycle of technical professionals for varied skills such as Internet Technologies, E- Commerce, BPM, System Administration, DBA’s, Telecom, Networking, etc. Hired, trained and mentored recruiters.
